hero.title: Hello, i'm Gabriel Stoppa
hero.welcome: Welcome to my portfolio site! Here you can find all the info you need about my professional developer life, projects, hobbies, technical readings and a lot of what makes me who i am!

about.title: About me
paragraphs: I'm a Full-stack developer currently living at Curitiba - Paran√°, Brasil, havin a Bachelor of Laws degree and studying for a Software Engineer Degree ar UNINTER.

I know the basics of logic and web development since 2012, but i've really started to dig deep into the development world january 2021, when i saw the need of a software to automate my work at the college's law practice classes!
Since then, i've been improving my software development skills, always learning new technologies and testing my knowledge!
